data.title: New English Library
data.meta_description: Book: Frank Herbert - Heretics Of Dune - New English Library - Paperback - UK - 0450057771 (1985)
data.text:
ppint.

24th Jul 2019

near-identical open market new english library p/b edition, same isbn, same

cover art gerry grace

cover price £2.50

512pp? including titles, indica etc, end pp.

this nel open market edition is not accounted amongst new english library's uk p/b editions' indica publishing histories

first uk p/b edition 3/1985:

cover art by gerry grace

cover price £2.95

512pp? including titles, indica etc, end pp. advertising

separate indica publishing history lines:

nel open market edition 1984

first nel paperback edition march 1985

near-identical second printing 5/1985 except:

should add "reprinted may 1985"

.. ..

.. ..

24th printing 9/2000 near-identical except:

bar-code and probly first to add

isbn13: 978-0450-05777-9

cover price £6.99

uk p/b rights reverted to victor gollancz ltd, who'd by now been taken over by orion publishing group:

orion/gollancz p/b 8/2003
